definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: However the market economy system has brought about a strong dash to the heating supply of the cogeneration.
sentences.chinese: 市场经济体制带给热电联产向采暖供热以猛烈冲击。

sentences.english: The combined heat and power unit turbine control systems were studied.
sentences.chinese: 并对热电联产机组汽机控制系统进行了分析。

sentences.english: Right thermocouples, heat resistance , is a very good tool.
sentences.chinese: 对热电偶，热电阻的计算，是一个很好的工具软件。

sentences.english: Right thermocouples, heat resistance , is a very good tool.
sentences.chinese: 对热电偶，热电阻的计算，是一个很好的工具软件。

sentences.english: The pyroelectricity characteristics of pyrite can be used as the indicators for prospecting of gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿的热电性特征可作为金矿的找矿标志。

sentences.english: The calibration of thermocouples plays a very important part in its using process.
sentences.chinese: 热电偶的检定是其使用过程中必不可少的工作环节。

sentences.english: With the completion of a thermal power plant and a gas works in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 另有一座热电厂和煤气厂也即将先后建成。

sentences.english: Reference Channel. On a thermocouple scanner card, the channel that measures the temperature of the isothermal block.
sentences.chinese: 参考通道在热电偶扫描卡上，测量等温块温度的通道。

sentences.english: A series of micro (small) thermoelectric generators were manufactured based on above theories.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上研制了一系列的微小型热电发电器。

sentences.english: The lower part of the measuring cup houses a thermoelectric cooler.
sentences.chinese: 量杯的下部有热电制冷器。

sentences.english: For current measurements, the customers use thermoelements connected in parallel with precision shunts .
sentences.chinese: 对于电流测量来说，客户使用热电偶并联精密分压器。

sentences.english: This paper deals first with the basic principles of the thermo-electric effect in metal cutting.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先阐明了金属切削中热电效应的基本原理。

sentences.english: Try checking the die exit temperature with a surface thermocouple.
sentences.chinese: 要设法用表面热电偶检查口模出口温度。

sentences.english: The use of other types of thermocouple elements require approval by SECCO.
sentences.chinese: 其它类型的热电偶元件的使用要得到赛科的批准。

sentences.english: K-type thermocouple, contactless switch relay, limit unit.
sentences.chinese: 型热电偶，非接触型继电器开关，极限装置。

sentences.english: Solar-thermal power stations have several advantages over solar-photovoltaic projects.
sentences.chinese: 跟光伏太阳能工程相比，太阳能热电站有好几个优点。

definition: to generate electricity/to send a telegram
chemical industry, abbr. of 化學工業|化学工业[hua4 xue2 gong1 ye4]/chemical engineering, abbr. of 化學工程|化学工程[hua4 xue2 gong1 cheng2]
